name: CPGridButton
desc: A menu item button displayed on a grid template.

items.name: init(titleVariants: [String], image: UIImage, handler: ((CPGridButton) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Creates a grid button with the specified title variants, image, and action handler.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that enables and disables the grid button.

items.name: var titleVariants: [String]
items.desc: An array of title variants for the button.

items.name: var image: UIImage
items.desc: The image displayed on the button.
